g3602.definition: [ὀδυρμός] from a derivative of the base of {{g1416}}; moaning, i.e. lamentation

g3603.definition: [ὅ ἐστι] from the neuter of {{g3739}} and the third person singular present indicative of {{g1510}}; which is

g3604.definition: [Ὀζίας] of Hebrew origin ({{h5818}}); Ozias (i.e. Uzzijah), an Israelite

g3605.definition: [ὄζω] a primary verb (in a strengthened form); to scent (usually an ill "odor")

g3606.definition: [ὅθεν] from {{g3739}} with the directive enclitic of source; from which place or source or cause (adverb or conjunction)

g3607.definition: [ὀθόνη] of uncertain affinity; a linen cloth, i.e. (especially) a sail

g3608.definition: [ὀθόνιον] neuter of a presumed derivative of {{g3607}}; a linen bandage

g3609.definition: [οἰκεῖος] from {{g3624}}; domestic, i.e. (as noun), a relative, adherent

g3610.definition: [οἰκέτης] from {{g3611}}; a fellow resident, i.e. menial domestic

g3611.definition: [οἰκέω] from {{g3624}}; to occupy a house, i.e. reside (figuratively, inhabit, remain, inhere); by implication, to cohabit See also {{g3625}}.

g3612.definition: [οἴκημα] from {{g3611}}; a tenement, i.e. (specially), a jail

g3613.definition: [οἰκητήριον] neuter of a presumed derivative of {{g3611}} (equivalent to {{g3612}}); a residence (literally or figuratively)

g3614.definition: [οἰκία] from {{g3624}}; properly, residence (abstractly), but usually (concretely) an abode (literally or figuratively); by implication, a family (especially domestics)

g3616.definition: [οἰκοδεσποτέω] from {{g3617}}; to be the head of (i.e. rule) a family

g3617.definition: [οἰκοδεσπότης] from {{g3624}} and {{g1203}}; the head of a family

g3618.definition: [οἰκοδομέω] from the same as {{g3619}}; to be a house-builder, i.e. construct or (figuratively) confirm

g3619.definition: [οἰκοδομή] feminine (abstract) of a compound of {{g3624}} and the base of {{g1430}}; architecture, i.e. (concretely) a structure; figuratively, confirmation

g3621.definition: [οἰκονομέω] from {{g3623}}; to manage (a house, i.e. an estate)

g3622.definition: [οἰκονομία] from {{g3623}}; administration (of a household or estate); specially, a (religious) "economy"

g3623.definition: [οἰκονόμος] from {{g3624}} and the base of {{g3551}}; a house-distributor (i.e. manager), or overseer, i.e. an employee in that capacity; by extension, a fiscal agent (treasurer); figuratively, a preacher (of the Gospel)

g3624.definition: [οἶκος] of uncertain affinity; a dwelling (more or less extensive, literal or figurative); by implication, a family (more or less related, literally or figuratively)

g3625.definition: [οἰκουμένη] feminine participle present passive of {{g3611}} (as noun, by implication, of {{g1093}}); land, i.e. the (terrene part of the) globe; specially, the Roman empire

g3626.definition: [οἰκουρός] from {{g3624}} and οὖρος (a guard; be "ware"); a stayer at home, i.e. domestically inclined (a "good housekeeper")

g3627.definition: [οἰκτείρω]  also (in certain tenses) prolonged      οἰκτερέωfrom οἶκτος (pity); to exercise pity

g3630.definition: [οἰνοπότης] from {{g3631}} and a derivative of the alternate of {{g4095}}; a tippler

g3631.definition: [οἶνος] a primary word (or perhaps of Hebrew origin ({{h3196}})); "wine" (literally or figuratively)

g3632.definition: [οἰνοφλυγία] from {{g3631}} and a form of the base of {{g5397}}; an overflow (or surplus) of wine, i.e. vinolency (drunkenness)

g3633.definition: [οἴομαι] , or (shorter)      οἶμαιmiddle voice apparently from {{g3634}}; to make like (oneself), i.e. imagine (be of the opinion)

g3634.definition: [οἷος] probably akin to {{g3588}}, {{g3739}}, and {{g3745}}; such or what sort of (as a correlation or exclamation); especially the neuter (adverbially) with negative, not so

g3635.definition: [ὀκνέω] from ὄκνος (hesitation); to be slow (figuratively, loath)

g3637.definition: [ὀκταήμερος] from {{g3638}} and {{g2250}}; an eight-day old person or act

g3639.definition: [ὄλεθρος] from a primary ὄλλυμι (to destroy; a prolonged form); ruin, i.e. death, punishment

g3640.definition: [ὀλιγόπιστος] from {{g3641}} and {{g4102}}; incredulous, i.e. lacking confidence (in Christ)

g3641.definition: [ὀλίγος] of uncertain affinity; puny (in extent, degree, number, duration or value); especially neuter (adverbially) somewhat

g3643.definition: [ὀλιγωρέω] from a compound of {{g3641}} and ὤρα ("care"); to have little regard for, i.e. to disesteem

g3644.definition: [ὀλοθρευτής] from {{g3645}}; a ruiner, i.e. (specially), a venomous serpent

g3646.definition: [ὁλοκαύτωμα] from a derivative of a compound of {{g3650}} and a derivative of {{g2545}}; a wholly-consumed sacrifice ("holocaust")

g3648.definition: [ὁλόκληρος] from {{g3650}} and {{g2819}}; complete in every part, i.e. perfectly sound (in body)

g3649.definition: [ὀλολύζω] a reduplicated primary verb; to "howl" or "halloo", i.e. shriek

g3650.definition: [ὅλος] a primary word; "whole" or "all", i.e. complete (in extent, amount, time or degree), especially (neuter) as noun or adverb

g3651.definition: [ὁλοτελής] from {{g3650}} and {{g5056}}; complete to the end, i.e. absolutely perfect

g3652.definition: [Ὀλυμπᾶς] probably a contraction from Ὀλυμπιόδωρος (Olympian-bestowed, i.e. heaven-descended); Olympas, a Christian

g3653.definition: [ὄλυνθος] of uncertain derivation; an unripe (because out of season) fig

g3654.definition: [ὅλως] adverb from {{g3650}}; completely, i.e. altogether; (by analogy), everywhere; (negatively) not by any means

g3655.definition: [ὄμβρος] of uncertain affinity; a thunder storm

g3656.definition: [ὁμιλέω] from {{g3658}}; to be in company with, i.e. (by implication) to converse

g3658.definition: [ὅμιλος] from the base of {{g3674}} and a derivative of the alternate of {{g138}} (meaning a crowd); association together, i.e. a multitude

g3659.definition: [ὄμμα] from {{g3700}}; a sight, i.e. (by implication) the eye

g3660.definition: [ὀμνύω] ; a prolonged form of a primary,                         but obsolete ὄμω, for which                         another prolonged form      ὀμόω    is used in certain tenses; to swear, i.e. take (or declare on) oath

g3661.definition: [ὁμοθυμαδόν] adverb from a compound of the base of {{g3674}} and {{g2372}}; unanimously

g3663.definition: [ὁμοιοπαθής] from {{g3664}} and the alternate of {{g3958}}; similarly affected

g3664.definition: [ὅμοιος] from the base of {{g3674}}; similar (in appearance or character)

g3666.definition: [ὁμοιόω] from {{g3664}}; to assimilate, i.e. compare; passively, to become similar

g3670.definition: [ὁμολογέω] from a compound of the base of {{g3674}} and {{g3056}}; to assent, i.e. covenant, acknowledge

g3672.definition: [ὁμολογουμένως] adverb of present passive participle of {{g3670}}; confessedly

g3673.definition: [ὁμότεχνος] from the base of {{g3674}} and {{g5078}}; a fellow-artificer

g3674.definition: [ὁμοῦ] genitive case of ὁμός (the same; akin to {{g260}}) as adverb; at the same place or time

g3675.definition: [ὁμόφρων] from the base of {{g3674}} and {{g5424}}; like-minded, i.e. harmonious

g3676.definition: [ὅμως] adverb from the base of {{g3674}}; at the same time, i.e. (conjunctionally) notwithstanding, yet still

g3678.definition: [ὀνάριον] neuter of a presumed derivative of {{g3688}}; a little ass

g3679.definition: [ὀνειδίζω] from {{g3681}}; to defame, i.e. rail at, chide, taunt

g3681.definition: [ὄνειδος] probably akin to the base of {{g3686}}; notoriety, i.e. a taunt (disgrace)

g3683.definition: [Ὀνησίφορος] from a derivative of {{g3685}} and {{g5411}}; profit-bearer; Onesiphorus, a Christian

g3684.definition: [ὀνικός] from {{g3688}}; belonging to a ass, i.e. large (so as to be turned by a ass)

g3685.definition: [ὀνίνημι] a prolonged form of an apparently primary verb (ὄνομαι, to slur); for which another prolonged form (ὀνάω) is used as an alternate in some tenses (unless indeed it be identical with the base of {{g3686}} through the idea of notoriety); to gratify, i.e. (middle voice) to derive pleasure or advantage from

g3686.definition: [ὄνομα] from a presumed derivative of the base of {{g1097}} (compare {{g3685}}); a "name" (literally or figuratively) (authority, character)

g3687.definition: [ὀνομάζω] from {{g3686}}; to name, i.e. assign an appellation; by extension, to utter, mention, profess

g3688.definition: [ὄνος] apparently a primary word; a donkey

g3689.definition: [ὄντως] adverb of the oblique cases of {{g5607}}; really

g3691.definition: [ὀξύς] probably akin to the base of {{g188}} ("acid"); keen; by analogy, rapid

g3692.definition: [ὀπή] probably from {{g3700}}; a hole (as if for light), i.e. cavern; by analogy, a spring (of water)

g3693.definition: [ὄπισθεν] from ὄπις (regard; from {{g3700}}) with enclitic of source; from the rear (as a secure aspect), i.e. at the back (adverb and preposition of place or time)

g3694.definition: [ὀπίσω] from the same as {{g3693}} with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. aback (as adverb or preposition of time or place; or as noun)

g3695.definition: [ὁπλίζω] from {{g3696}}; to equip (with weapons (middle voice and figuratively))

g3696.definition: [ὅπλον] probably from a primary ἕπω (to be busy about); an implement or utensil or tool (literally or figuratively, especially, offensive for war)

g3697.definition: [ὁποῖος] from {{g3739}} and {{g4169}}; of what kind that, i.e. how (as) great (excellent) (specially, as an indefinite correlative to the definite antecedent {{g5108}} of quality)

g3698.definition: [ὁπότε] from {{g3739}} and {{g4218}}; what(-ever) then, i.e. (of time) as soon as

g3699.definition: [ὅπου] from {{g3739}} and {{g4225}}; what(-ever) where, i.e. at whichever spot

g3700.definition: [ὀπτάνομαι] ; a (middle voice) prolonged form of the primary (middle voice)      ὄπτομαι;    which is used for it in certain                                   tenses; and both as alternate of                                   {{g3708}}; to gaze (i.e. with wide-open eyes, as at something remarkable; and thus differing from {{g991}}, which denotes simply voluntary observation; and from {{g1492}}, which expresses merely mechanical, passive or casual vision; while {{g2300}}, and still more emphatically its intensive {{g2334}}, signifies an earnest but more continued inspection; and {{g4648}} a watching from a distance)
